channel.title: Bedrock Wisdom Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Seeking to understand the many ideas that unite us
channel.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
channel.itunes:summary: Have you ever wondered what Quakers, Jains, and Sikhs have in common? Why is it that ascetic practices have been revered in nearly all parts of the world? Did you know that many 'new' discoveries in psychology are now validating ideas that the Buddha taught 2,500 years ago? In this series we explore the underlying concepts and ideas that appear to be at the core of many religious, and at times secular, traditions.
channel.description: Have you ever wondered what Quakers, Jains, and Sikhs have in common? Why is it that ascetic practices have been revered in nearly all parts of the world? Did you know that many 'new' discoveries in psychology are now validating ideas that the Buddha taught 2,500 years ago? In this series we explore the underlying concepts and ideas that appear to be at the core of many religious, and at times secular, traditions.

item.title: Introduction
item.itunes:title: Introduction
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Bedrock Wisdom. A show in which we seek to understand the many ideas, religious and secular, that unite us.
item.description: Welcome to Bedrock Wisdom. A show in which we seek to understand the many ideas, religious and secular, that unite us.

item.title: Episode 1 - The Role of Myth
item.itunes:title: Episode 1 - The Role of Myth
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is myth and how does it play a role in human experience?
item.description: What is myth and how does it play a role in human experience?

item.title: Episode 2 - Compassion
item.itunes:title: Episode 2 - Compassion
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the stories of Avalokiteshvara as well as how Jesus responded to the loss of a friend.
item.description: We discuss the stories of Avalokiteshvara as well as how Jesus responded to the loss of a friend.

item.title: Episode 3 - Ritual
item.itunes:title: Episode 3 - Ritual
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is ritual and how does it play a role in our everyday life?
item.description: What is ritual and how does it play a role in our everyday life?

item.title: Episode 4 - Interdependence
item.itunes:title: Episode 4 - Interdependence
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the idea of how everything is connected through the Daoist lense of Yin and Yang and the Buddhist concept of interdependence.
item.description: We discuss the idea of how everything is connected through the Daoist lense of Yin and Yang and the Buddhist concept of interdependence.

item.title: Episode 5 - Meditation and Prayer
item.itunes:title: Episode 5 - Meditation and Prayer
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the function of prayer and meditation and how they can act as a tool for keeping our mind grounded.
item.description: We discuss the function of prayer and meditation and how they can act as a tool for keeping our mind grounded.

item.title: Episode 6 - Family and Relationships
item.itunes:title: Episode 6 - Family and Relationships
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is the value in having relationships with family and others? How are these emphasized in different traditions?
item.description: What is the value in having relationships with family and others? How are these emphasized in different traditions?

item.title: Episode 7 - Humility
item.itunes:title: Episode 7 - Humility
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Is humility a weakness or a strength? We look at this topic through the lenses of Zen, Greek philosophy, Humanism, Christianity, and Daoism.
item.description: Is humility a weakness or a strength? We look at this topic through the lenses of Zen, Greek philosophy, Humanism, Christianity, and Daoism.

item.title: Episode 8 - Asceticism
item.itunes:title: Episode 8 - Asceticism
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Asceticism, the practice of denying one's own personal desires in search of spiritual growth, has existed for thousands of years across a wide variety of traditions. We discuss some of those traditions.
item.description: Asceticism, the practice of denying one's own personal desires in search of spiritual growth, has existed for thousands of years across a wide variety of traditions. We discuss some of those traditions.

item.title: Episode 9 - Community
item.itunes:title: Episode 9 - Community
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: From small hunter-gatherer groups to whole nations, communities fill a fundamental role in our physical and mental well being. In this episode we discuss the value that participation in smaller, more intimate communities provides.
item.description: From small hunter-gatherer groups to whole nations, communities fill a fundamental role in our physical and mental well being. In this episode we discuss the value that participation in smaller, more intimate communities provides.

item.title: Episode 10 - Non-Violence
item.itunes:title: Episode 10 - Non-Violence
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: There is no question that humanity has often engaged in violence in an effort to make social changes. So how does one make a stand while refusing to engage in this ugly tendency? In this episode we highlight three groups who have tackled this challenge with success.
item.description: There is no question that humanity has often engaged in violence in an effort to make social changes. So how does one make a stand while refusing to engage in this ugly tendency? In this episode we highlight three groups who have tackled this challenge with success.

item.title: Episode 11 - The Golden Rule
item.itunes:title: Episode 11 - The Golden Rule
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Treat others the way you want to be treated. This concept has presented itself so often throughout history in one form or another that it's hard to keep track of. In this episode we discuss some of those sources.
item.description: Treat others the way you want to be treated. This concept has presented itself so often throughout history in one form or another that it's hard to keep track of. In this episode we discuss some of those sources.

item.itunes:episode:
12 Episode 12 - Faith Episode 12 - Faith Tyler Robbins Faith, the act of accepting as truth an idea that cannot be scientifically verified, is inspiring... and complicated. In this episode we discuss faith and how it relates to things like works (action) and doubt.
Faith, the act of accepting as truth an idea that cannot be scientifically verified, is inspiring... and complicated. In this episode we discuss faith and how it relates to things like works (action) and doubt.
